short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power Camera is a modern camera app for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Power Camera allows you to choose external USB cameras form within the app without the need to go to the Chrome Settings page. 

Features camera capture and video recording (no audio - I'm working on it!).

COMING SOON
* gallery view
* include audio in video capture
* camera filters
* sharing ability

Please feel free to request features on the support tab.
